articles.title: Paul Auster, author of ‘New York Trilogy,’ dead at 77 - CNN
articles.description: Paul Auster, the acclaimed American author of “The New York Trilogy,” has died at age 77.
articles.content:
Paul Auster, the acclaimed American author of The New York Trilogy, has died at age 77.
Auster, who was born in Newark, New Jersey in 1947, had a long career not only as a celebrated novelist, but a… [+3626 chars]
